text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/3d30af8783bf43fbfece641ec81ad8d2f01b3735|patch 8.2.1844: using "q" at the more prompt doesn't stop a long message>
patch 8.2.1844: using "q" at the more prompt doesn't stop a long message

Problem:    Using "q" at the more prompt doesn't stop a long message.
Solution:   Check for "got_int". (closes #7122)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b9616af23f31fc18721a92643c21f42b69854efe|patch 8.2.1843: Netbeans: with huge buffer number memory allocation m…>
patch 8.2.1843: Netbeans: with huge buffer number memory allocation may fail

Problem:    Netbeans: with huge buffer number memory allocation may fail.
Solution:   Check for size overflow.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1843: Netbeans: with huge buffer number memory allocation m… · vim/vim@b9616af
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1843: Netbeans: with huge buffer number memory allocation m… · vim/vim@b9616af
attachments.text: …ay fail Problem: Netbeans: with huge buffer number memory allocation may fail. Solution: Check for size overflow.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/21cbe175eece17fad21d7403b00422445b587138|patch 8.2.1842: crash when USE_FNAME_CASE is defined and using :browse>
patch 8.2.1842: crash when USE_FNAME_CASE is defined and using :browse

Problem:    Crash when USE_FNAME_CASE is defined and using :browse.
Solution:   Don't use read-only memory for ".". (Yegappan Lakshmanan,
            closes #7123)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/2b9b17ea5daaaa693d0891e9a999d711f0e0f743|patch 8.2.1841: Vim9: test for compilation error fails in normal build>
patch 8.2.1841: Vim9: test for compilation error fails in normal build

Problem:    Vim9: test for compilation error fails in normal build.
Solution:   Invoke CheckRunVimInTerminal in a separate function.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1841: Vim9: test for compilation error fails in normal build · vim/vim@2b9b17e
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1841: Vim9: test for compilation error fails in normal build · vim/vim@2b9b17e
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: test for compilation error fails in normal build. Solution: Invoke CheckRunVimInTerminal in a separate function.
